content: Your Soaks can't be upgraded. Unlike the Drinks and the Gourd itself, which can be upgraded. Therefore, you can't enhance the effect of the Thunderbolt Horn. If you want to switch to a different Soak, be sure to visit the Shen Monkey Vendor throughout your game to continue equipping new ones.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Thunderbolt_Horn.md', within the main section titled 'Thunderbolt Horn'.
The content is as follows:
Your Soaks can't be upgraded. Unlike the Drinks and the Gourd itself, which can be upgraded. Therefore, you can't enhance the effect of the Thunderbolt Horn. If you want to switch to a different Soak, be sure to visit the Shen Monkey Vendor throughout your game to continue equipping new ones.
